definitions.definition: a person who competes in sports

examples.text: Depression is thought to be common among **elite athletes**.
a training facility for amateur and professional athletes
Her company is designing part of the Olympic **athletes' village**.
The athletes are training hard for the Olympics.
one of the greatest athletes of all time
She's a superbly gifted all-round athlete.

definitions.definition: a person who competes in sports such as running, jumping and throwing

examples.text: He played baseball and basketball and excelled as a track athlete.
She was hailed as the greatest female athlete in the world.

definitions.definition: a person who is good at sports and physical exercise

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Latin athleta, from Greek athlētēs, from athlein ‘compete for a prize’, from athlon ‘prize’.
